title: Coldplay
subtitle: One of the most influential bands of our time
description: Founded in the UK, this pop-rock band is continuing to leave an unprecedented mark in the music scene of the XXI century, becoming one of the most iconic and beloved bands of our time. With its colorful performances and hits, Coldplay has achieved extraordinary international success, blending elements of pop, rock, alternative, and electronic music with introspective lyrics and captivating melodies. The most explored themes are love, hope, introspection, and the human experience, resonating deeply with listeners worldwide.

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Start of activity of Uk pop rock bands
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q484641 . # pop rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q145 . # from uk
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date . # formation year         
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 20

Show other bands from this country

dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT (?instrumentLabel AS ?label) (COUNT(?member) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  wd:Q45188 wdt:P527 ?member.
  ?member wdt:P1303 ?instrument.
  ?instrument rdfs:label ?instrumentLabel.
  
  FILTER (lang(?instrumentLabel) = "en").
}
GROUP BY ?instrument ?instrumentLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?count)

dynamic_elements.text:
Welcome to our story! To kick off our project, may we present you Coldplay members!

A little side note, Phil Harvey is known as the creative director of the band, which makes him the fifth “essence” of the band.

The band members met at University College of London and, after having changed the band’s name a few times between 1996 and 1998, in the end “Coldplay” was the final choice, which was inspired by a book of children’s poems called “Child’s Reflections: Cold Play”.
Now, let’s have a look at Coldplay’s multiple souls (which mix multiple genres), as well as other bands that share the same musical styles and the country of origin.
Moving on, you’ll be able to dive into Coldplay’s instruments, musical influences, top songs, and albums. Enjoy! :)
